contents.text: Welcome to Creative Market in San Francisco, your destination for premium design assets starting at two dollars.
Press 1 for sales and product information.
Press 1 to purchase graphics, fonts, themes, and photos.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for purchasing design assets.

navigationGoals: Purchase a set of high-res logo templates for an upcoming project
I’d like to purchase some custom fonts and photos for the brochure I’m creating for my veteran-owned small business.
I want to purchase a vector-based UI icon set in SVG format.
I want to buy some fonts and images for a family photo project
I’d like to purchase vector graphics templates for my physics research poster.

contents.text: Press 2 to learn about our enterprise subscription plans.
Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise solutions team.

navigationGoals: Get a quote and feature overview for an enterprise subscription for my design team
I need details on your enterprise subscription plans to see if I can get a group license for my nonprofit veterans’ organization.
I need enterprise license details and API integration specs.
I need information on signing up our small art group for a business plan
I’m looking for information on department-wide subscription plans for our physics lab’s design resources.

contents.text: Press 2 for customer support and account services.
Press 1 for technical support for your design assets.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Fix an issue where downloaded assets won’t open in Illustrator
I’m having trouble installing the design assets I just downloaded—can you help troubleshoot the font file?
I'm experiencing a font-rendering error in Sketch—need technical support.
I’m having trouble opening the design files I downloaded
I need technical assistance installing the custom font I downloaded for my seminar slides.

contents.text: Press 2 for billing, invoices, and account inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account services.

navigationGoals: Clarify unexpected charges on my latest Creative Market invoice
I need a copy of last month’s invoice for the graphics I bought so I can submit it for reimbursement.
I'd like a copy of my latest subscription invoice for cost allocation.
I need help understanding the charges on my latest invoice
Could I get an itemized invoice for my recent design asset purchases on my account?
